Syrian Preparatory Committee Formed 
   Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- The Syrian preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16 in 2007 was inaugurated in Damascus with due ceremony on Dec. 13.
 Adnan Ismail, deputy general secretary of the Socialist Unionist Party of Syria, was elected chairman of the committee.    
 The committee decided to set the days from December 15, 2006 to April 30, 2007 as a period of commemorations and arrange in the period   various functions including meetings, photo exhibitions and film shows to hail the immortal feats performed by President Kim Il Sung for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence and the validity and the vitality of Kim Jong Il's Songun policy and give wide publicity to the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.
